AboutPage.title: raafy.dev - About
AboutPage.heading: About Me
AboutPage.content1: I am a dedicated Web/Mobile Developer with a strong background in Computer Science and over 4 years of experience in creating responsive web and mobile applications. Proficient in a variety of modern web technologies and frameworks, I excel in developing high-quality projects that are both scalable and efficient.
AboutPage.content2: My expertise includes building user-friendly interfaces and implementing robust backend solutions. With a proactive attitude and a commitment to continuous learning, I am always eager to expand my technical skills and stay updated with industry trends.
